execution_quality: The agent made targeted edits and ran validation tests, but the fix appears to have been incomplete or incorrect based on the user's follow-up report that the feature still wasn't working.

summary: The agent attempted to fix a --summary option bug but the fix was unsuccessful, as evidenced by the user reporting the feature still doesn't work in their follow-up message.
